channel.title: Item prices
channel.description: ok, in item.cfg i know how to change item prices, but how can i make it a certain price, say...10m or 15m or 20m for an item, how do i make it a price because i usually added random numbers for a price, please help

item.title: Item prices
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

[quote=“josh555, post:5, topic:198945”]then you type 15000000 where the price goes…[/quote]15000000 wont work FFS i need someone smart to help me please! its something like multiply or divide…has something to do with it. i just dont know what

item.title: Item prices
item.dc:creator: @josh555 josh555
item.description:
@josh555 wrote:

this is the template for what is in your item.cfg

//-----id---name----------examine--------price--------price------price----stab a---slash a---crush a--- magic a--- range a---stab d--- slash d--- crush d---magic d--- range d--- str b--- pray b---

a = attack. d = def Just change the numbers under price and you will change the price.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2008, 07:01:08 AM[/size][hr][quote=“MladenJ, post:2, topic:198945”] if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) // this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Kyled123")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "I dont know how to write in english"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Im going to learn some english"; } } }[/quote]

Maybe you should learn how to read english? I understood him quite fine/

Read full topic
